name: A. George and Accommodation
statement:
George has recently entered the BSUCP (Berland State University for Cool
Programmers). George has a friend Alex who has also entered the
university. Now they are moving into a dormitory. George and Alex want
to live in the same room. The dormitory has rooms in total. At the
moment the -th room has people living in it and the room can accommodate
people in total (). Your task is to count how many rooms has free place
for both George and Alex.
